name: TMD's Party Palace
description:
You are Throg-Morton-Dreeb (TMD for short!), an acolyte of the Party God, Devin. In order to appease your god, you must do damage control at his big bash and fix all of your party guests' problems. The attendees are a rambunctious group of goblins, orcs, elves and other mysterious magical creatures. It's up to you to make sure The Vibe of the party doesn't run out and shame your name. Your guests needs range from needing fresh drinks to pacifying a raging barbarian into a harmless balloon. Be on the lookout for the life of the party, Frog Wizard, to help you out when times get tough. Good luck and party on!

Credits:
